Uber is a very convenient way of getting from point A to B. You know exactly what your fee is going to be. My tip is to Uber drivers. If you want a tip from me, I expect you to do something above and beyond getting me to the agreed upon destination with the agreed upon price. Open my door or something that is customer service related. A tip should not be an expectation, Uber if you are reading, and drivers should not be allowed to take tips into consideration for their ratings!
